topic.title: Hello,Greeting from a Chinese
topic.body: How does this website work?Base on P2P?But how can everyone save such huge data?

1_17R9N6TFQ5u4MnbppJqbyXt9jNe1WkijRY.body:
> [freedonn](#comment_1_18DExvnWNRp3xKFDmxuQtDKAnyhpE6e5xv): Different people save  different data, so everyone can get every file,I think.
You mean,Everyone who connected this website store a little data,and the total data is huge?

> [akito](#comment_127_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): But basically, yes it works over P2P based on its blockchain. And nobody has to save "huge data". You only save every zite you visit and can opt out of the ones you don't need, too. You don't seed pictures, videos or other bigger files automatically, you have to manually opt in.

I see,thank you
